metadata.synopsis: Gale is interested in items woven with especially powerful magic. In these lines, you see one such item. This one is an Idol of Silvanus.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: A god's idol has to have some magic lingering in it. Your sort of thing, Gale?

1.speaker: Gale
1.text: Silvanus is an ancient and powerful god. I'm sure the magic in that idol is... delicious.
